name: Diagonal View
overview:
Diagonal View makes entertaining video content that reaches mass audiences. We distribute it across the world’s leading media platforms, such as YouTube, Yahoo! and MSN, where it is watched by more than 70 million viewers a month.

Our dedicated team combine their talent and experience to conceptualize, design, develop and deliver quality videos.

We don’t like to brag but we’re already the world’s biggest independent producer of digital video content and we’re growing rapidly every month.

Our Production Process

In real time, we use our extensive editorial experience and audience knowledge, along with popular Internet search terms, to choose the right subject matter for our content. Our access to vast content catalogs, along with our efficient working methods, mean we can produce videos in a cost-effective manner, while ensuring quality output.

Our Audience

We have a vast audience that just keeps growing. This provides us with valuable feedback that we use to improve our content and end-user experience, delivering value to our partners through our revenue-sharing program. We generate revenue through advertising and sponsorship, distributing our content through video-friendly media outlets and sharing the revenue with them. We already work with YouTube, Bing, Facebook, Skype and Yahoo!, among others, and we are expanding all the time.

external_links.title: Diagonal View might be the biggest name in video you haven't heard of.
